DOC.brief_summary: This is a single-center, randomized, open-label, single- and multiple-dose, five-treatment, two-period, four-way parallel study comparing the pharmacokinetics (PK) of Diazoxide Choline Controlled-Release Tablet (DCCR) administered orally under fed and fasting conditions at two dose levels.
DOC.brief_title: Open-Label, Single- and Multiple-Dose Pharmacokinetic Study of Diazoxide Choline
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Healthy adults Fasting glucose ≤ 125 mg/dL and HbA1C ≤ 6.5 Fasting triglyceride ≥150 mg/dL and ≤ 500 mg/dL Known CAD, DM, uncontrolled HTN Pregnancy or unable to complaint with the birth control method required
